class.name: HTTPRequest
class.brief_description: A Node with the ability to send HTTP requests.
class.description: A Node with the ability to send HTTP requests. Uses a [HTTPClient] internally, supports HTTPS. Can be used to make HTTP requests or download files via HTTP.

method.name: get_download_file
method.description: Return the file this request will download into.

method.name: get_downloaded_bytes
method.description: Return the amount of bytes this HTTPRequest downloaded.

method.name: get_http_client_status
method.description: Return the current status of the underlying [HTTPClient].

method.name: get_max_redirects
method.description: Return the maximum amount of redirects that will be followed.

method.name: is_using_threads
method.description: Whether this request is using threads.

method.name: request
method.description: Make a HTTP request (by default GET, unless specified otherwise as method). The url is the complete url including "http://" or "https://" which will be parsed for a host and a port. The custom_headers are HTTP request headers which will be used. If User-Agent is not specified a Godot specific will be used. The ssl_validate_domain specifies if in case of HTTPS the server certificate should be verified.

method.name: set_body_size_limit
method.description: Set the response body size limit.

method.name: set_download_file
method.description: Set the file to download into. Outputs the response body into the file.

method.name: set_max_redirects
method.description: Set the maximum amount of redirects the request will follow.

signal.name: request_completed
signal.description: This signal is emitted upon request completion.
